page.title: 05THE FARMER'S WIFE'S DAY
page.content: THE FARMER'S WIFE WORKS ON HER HUSBAND'S FARM AS THEY HAVE NO PERMANENT HELP. HER JOBS ON THE FARM INCLUDE FEEDING THE CALVES AND MILKING THE COWS,SHE ALSO DRIVES THE TRACTOR WHEN HER HUSBAND IS WORKING IN THE FIELDS.IN THE HOUSE SHE COOKS, DOES THE HOUSEWORK AND LOOKS AFTER HUSBAND. IN HER{LEISURE TIME}SHE HELPS WITH THE LOCAL GUIDES AND BROWNIE GUIDES, SHE IS ALSO AN ACTIVE MEMBER OF THE WOMAN'S INSTITUTE. AS HER CHILDREN ARE AT BOARDING SCHOOL SHE VISITS THEM OFTEN. SHE ALSO VISITS HER FAMILY AND FRIENDS, SHE HELPS WITH THE WORK WITHIN THE PARISH. THE FARMER'S WIFE DAY DIFFERS ACCORDING TO THE SEASONS. IN THE WINTER AS THE ANIMALS ARE IN THE SHEDS SHE HAS TO FEED THEM SILAGE AND HAY. IN THE SUMMER MOST OF THE ANIMALS ARE OUT SO SHE ONLY HAS TO CHECK THEM.
